These settings are applied on a per member level basis. Start by selecting the member level you want to modify, then adjust the settings for that level below.
Do you want to let users view photo albums? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.

column1: Yes, allow members to view all albums, even private ones.
column2: Yes, allow members to view all albums, even private ones.

column1: Yes, allow viewing and subscription of photo albums.
column2: Yes, allow viewing and subscription of photo albums.

column1: No, do not allow photo albums to be viewed.
column2: No, do not allow photo albums to be viewed.

Do you want to let users create photo albums? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply. This is useful if you want users to be able to view photo albums and manage their subscriptions, but only want certain levels to be able to create photo albums.

column1: Yes, allow creation of photo albums.
column2: Yes, allow creation of photo albums.

column1: No, do not allow photo album to be created.
column2: No, do not allow photo album to be created.

column2: Do you want to let members of this level edit photo albums?

column1: No, do not allow photo album to be edited.

column1: Yes, allow members to edit their own albums.
column2: Yes, allow members to edit their own albums.

column1: Yes, allow members to edit all albums.
column2: Yes, allow members to edit all albums.

Your users can choose from any of the options checked below when they decide who can see their albums. These options appear on your users' "Create Album" and "Edit Album" pages. If you do not check any options, everyone will be allowed to view albums.

Your users can choose from any of the options checked below when they decide who can post comments on their albums and photos. If you do not check any options, everyone will be allowed to post comments on albums.

Your users can choose from any of the options checked below when they decide who can post tags on their albums and photos. If you do not check any options, everyone will be allowed to post tags on albums.

column1: Are you sure you want to delete the selected photo albums?
column2: Are you sure you want to delete the selected photo albums?

This page lists all of the photo albums your users have posted. You can use this page to monitor these albums and delete offensive material if necessary. Entering criteria into the filter fields will help you find specific album entries. Leaving the filter fields blank will show all the album entries on your social network.
